title: Tesla plans four new batteries in 2026, including for robotaxi, The Information reports
description: Tesla is designing four new versions of its in-house 4680 battery to power future models like the Cybertruck and a robotaxi. The company faces production challenges with cathode losses and dry-coated cells but aims to ramp up production by 2026 to improve margins and efficiency.
